songFile.label: Song
songFile.placeholder: Drop your song file here or click to upload.

deleteSong.content: Are you sure you want to delete the song?

signin.title: Sign in with your email
signin.subtitle: You will be signed in to Apple Music
signin.error: Your email or password is incorrect.

errors.default: We are not currently able to create new account, please try again later.
errors.auth/email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use by another account.

forgotPassword.title: Having trouble signing in?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to get started.

errors.auth/too-many-requests: You can only send password reset email every 45 minutes. Try again later.

success.title: Email Sent
success.subtitle: An email has been sent to your email address. Follow the directions in the email to update your password and then sign in again.
